Uses of Interface
com.complexible.stardog.api.Connection

Packages that use Connection
com.complexible.stardog.api Provides the core SNARL (Stardog Native API for the RDF Language) classes and interfaces for programmatic access to the Stardog DBMS. 
com.complexible.stardog.api.reasoning Provides reasoning connection class for answering queries with reasoning results. 
com.complexible.stardog.api.search Provides classes and interfaces for performing free-text search over a Stardog database via the SNARL API. 
com.complexible.stardog.icv.api Provides SNARL API bindings for Integrity Constraint Validation (ICV). 
com.complexible.stardog.jena Provides classes for Stardog-Jena integration. 
 

Uses of Connection in com.complexible.stardog.api

 interface ConnectionView<I extends Connection,O extends Connection>
          Interface to provide conversion of the 'view' of a connection to another type of connection.
 interface ConnectionView<I extends Connection,O extends Connection>
          Interface to provide conversion of the 'view' of a connection to another type of connection.
 

Methods in com.complexible.stardog.api with type parameters of type Connection
<T extends Connection>
T
Connection.as(Class<T> theView)
          Return this connection viewed as a different type of connection.

Subinterfaces of Connection in com.complexible.stardog.api.reasoning
 interface ReasoningConnection
          SNARL Connection which exposes reasoning specific functionality such as explanations and consistency checking.
 

Uses of Connection in com.complexible.stardog.api.search
 

Subinterfaces of Connection in com.complexible.stardog.api.search
 interface SearchConnection
          Extends the standard SNARL Connection exposing the full-text search support provided by Waldo.
 

Uses of Connection in com.complexible.stardog.icv.api
 

Subinterfaces of Connection in com.complexible.stardog.icv.api
 interface ICVConnection
          Interface to merge the SNARL Connection API with the standard IC validator so validation can be performed against a connection.
